Class EnemyYellow

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.cuni.mff.java.klima.pacman.entities.Entity

          • cz.cuni.mff.java.klima.pacman.entities.characters.enemies.EnemyYellow
  • public class EnemyYellow
extends Enemy
    EnemyYellow class controls movements and rendering of the yellow enemy.

    • Constructor Detail

      • EnemyYellow

        public EnemyYellow​(Handler handler,
                   float x,
                   float y)
        Constructor of EnemyYellow class only calls constructor of the abstract Enemy class. It takes the game handler for having access to the game map and its elements, an x-coordinate and a y-coordinate, which are both absolute in pixels, rather than in map tiles.
        Parameters:
        handler - game handler for accessing other elements of the game
        x - absolute x-coordinate in pixels
        y - absolute y-coordinate in pixels

    • Method Detail

      • moveChase

        void moveChase()
        Yellow enemy's implementation of chase mode movement.

        In the chase mode, the yellow enemy's target tile is completely random on every crossroads, resulting in its chaotic movement in the maze.

        Overrides:
        moveChase in class Enemy

      • moveScatter

        void moveScatter()
        Yellow enemy's implementation of scatter mode movement.

        In the scatter mode, the yellow enemy's target tile is located outside the maze in the lower left corner, resulting in it circulating around obstacles as near that corner as possible.

        Overrides:
        moveScatter in class Enemy

      • render

        public void render​(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Draws yellow enemy's image if it wasn't rendered by super method.
        Overrides:
        render in class Enemy
        Parameters:
        g - Graphics instance on which the images are rendered
